title: Ethereum's Fusaka upgrade goes live on Sepolia ahead of December mainnet launch
contentSnippet: The rollout marks the second phase of Ethereum’s three-step roadmap, testing higher gas limits and the new PeerDAS data-sampling system.

title: Republican Bill Aims to Make Trump's Bitcoin and Crypto 401K Order Federal Law
contentSnippet: Rep. Troy Downing (R-MT) said the bill would “supercharge” the financial security of Americans by exposing their retirement savings to alternative assets.

title: Bitcoin buyers build bids at $105K as crypto market meltdown nears conclusion
contentSnippet: Deep Bitcoin bids below $105,000 signal a market cleanup phase from last week’s historic liquidation event. After the dip-buying ends, will BTC reclaim $117,500?

title: Monad Opens Airdrop to Solana Users, Ethereum NFT Holders as MON Launch Nears
contentSnippet: Upcoming layer-1 network Monad announced more details about its MON airdrop, including key dates and an eligibility checker.

title: Stocks vs. Bitcoin in the AI era: Which will survive the next 50 years?
contentSnippet: The choice between Bitcoin and stocks isn’t simple. Here’s how analysts and data reveal how investors can approach it.

title: How low can Bitcoin price go if $110K BTC support fails?
contentSnippet: BTC can drop to $74,000 in the worst-case scenario if the price fails to hold above the $110,000 support level, but is the top really in?

title: U.S. Targets Cambodian Pig Butchering, Takes $14B in Bitcoin as Biggest Ever Seizure
contentSnippet: As the Justice Department pursues Prince Group's leader, the Treasury Department sanctioned the company while also severing Huione from the U.S. finance.

title: US moves to drop Bitcoin advocate Roger Ver’s tax case with $50M deal
contentSnippet: Less than a week after reports of an agreement between the "Bitcoin Jesus" and US authorities, Roger Ver’s 2024 criminal tax case may be nearing an end.

title: Elon Musk Gushes About Bitcoin 'Energy' Demands—Years After Environmental Gripes
contentSnippet: Elon Musk praised Bitcoin's energy foundation years after criticizing crypto's power consumption and halting Tesla BTC payments.

title: Myriad's New Perpetual Sentiment Markets Make Opinions 'The Most Valuable Commodity'
contentSnippet: With conventional polling, opinions cost nothing to express—limiting their accuracy. Perpetual Sentiment Markets fix that. Here's how.

title: BlackRock sees record quarter for iShares ETFs as Bitcoin, Ether demand surges
contentSnippet: Record inflows to BlackRock’s crypto ETFs cement the asset manager’s dominance as institutional investors pour billions into Bitcoin and Ethereum exposure.

title: Cathie Wood's ARK Invest Takes 11.5% Stake in Solana Treasury Firm Solmate Infrastructure (SLMT)
contentSnippet: Ark Invest has reportedly taken a 11.5% Solmate (SLMT) stake while the company said it bought $50 million discounted SOL from Solana Foundation.

title: PEPE Slips 5% as Whale Selling and Market Turmoil Weigh on Memecoin Sector
contentSnippet: Trading volume has surged, reflecting increased volatility, and technical analysis suggests bearish signals that could extend the recent downturn

title: Citigroup CEO Backs Tokenized Deposits, Says Too Much Focus on Stablecoins
contentSnippet: Speaking on her bank's earnings call, Citi CEO Jane Fraser said tokenized deposits offer faster, safer infrastructure and fewer AML and compliance burdens for the next era of digital finance.

title: XLM Suffers Massive Sell-Off on Heavy Volume Spike
contentSnippet: Stellar faces brutal selling pressure while institutional buyers emerge at oversold levels amid broader crypto market turmoil.

title: Circle Called ‘Most Important’ Stablecoin Player by Investment Firm William Blair
contentSnippet: The investment bank initiated coverage of Circle with an "Outperform" rating.

title: HBAR Plunges 8% After Failed Rally to $0.20 Resistance
contentSnippet: Cryptocurrency experiences dramatic reversal on heavy volume to confirm bearish momentum.

title: BlackRock Developing Tokenization Tech Amid Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF Success
contentSnippet: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink has long been bullish on tokenization—and said Tuesday that “young people” tend to use tokenized assets.

title: Bitcoin threatens $107K next as yearly open becomes key BTC price floor
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped back toward its lowest levels in several weeks after a rebound fizzled at $116,000, while an infamous whale stayed short BTC.

title: BNB Slides 6.5% After Hitting All-Time High After $500B Crypto Rout
contentSnippet: Despite the drop accumulation continues, with China Renaissance aiming to raise $600 million for a publicly traded crypto treasury focused solely on BNB.

title: DWS Sees Stablecoins Emerging as Core Payments Infrastructure
contentSnippet: With rising liquidity, regulatory clarity and institutional use, stablecoins are moving beyond crypto trading to challenge traditional payment networks, DWS said.

title: US Seeks $14 Billion in Bitcoin From Cambodian Crypto Scammer in Record Forfeiture
contentSnippet: The United States is seeking the forfeiture of more than $14 billion in Bitcoin tied to a "pig butchering" crypto scam.

title: Ether drops 8%, but traders say ETH price breakout to $10K is ‘loading’
contentSnippet: Ether price could retest the $3,800 level, but traders said Ethereum's native token was preparing for a breakout to new highs, with $10,000 in sight.

title: How a crypto trader turned $3K into $2M after CZ mentioned a memecoin
contentSnippet: After BNB Chain’s X hack, meme token “4” surged from $3K to $2M following CZ’s mention. We break down the timeline and key risks.

title: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink Eyes Bigger Role in Tokenization
contentSnippet: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink said the digital asset market, including stablecoins and tokenized assets, will grow "significantly" over the next few years

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Morning Minute: Citi Sets Sights on 2026 for Crypto Custody
contentSnippet: The third-biggest bank in the U.S. is finally embracing crypto. And it doesn't look like it's stopping at custody…

title: Crypto Markets Slide as Key Bitcoin Support Weakens and ETF Flows Reverse
contentSnippet: Analysts warn Bitcoin could fall toward $103,000 as it struggles to hold a critical support level amid major ETF outflows.

title: Ethereum ETFs Bleed $429M in Largest Single-Day Outflow Since Early September
contentSnippet: Analysts call the exodus a "macro reflex" triggered by tariff-driven volatility and liquidations, not a structural retreat from ETH exposure.

title: Hyperliquidの大口投資家、トランプ一族との関与を否定　再びビットコインを大規模ショート
contentSnippet: トランプ関税発表直前にビットコイン7億ドルをショートし約2億ドルの利益を得た大口投資家が、再び3億4千万ドル規模のBTCショートポジションを構築。インサイダー取引疑惑が浮上するも本人は否定。市場では1.3兆円規模の強制清算が発生し史上最大級の暴落に。

title: JPモルガンがビットコイン取引サービス参入へ　カストディは外部委託で対応
contentSnippet: JPモルガンのデジタル資産部門責任者が、顧客向けビットコイン取引サービスの提供を正式に確認した。カストディ業務は外部委託を検討し、コインベースとの提携も強化。大手金融機関の暗号資産市場参入が本格化する中、JPモルガンの戦略的アプローチとは。

title: シティバンク、2026年に仮想通貨カストディ事業参入へ
contentSnippet: 米大手金融機関シティバンクが2026年に暗号資産のカストディサービスを開始する計画を発表。ビットコインやイーサリアムなどを機関投資家向けに保管する。トランプ政権下での規制整備を背景に、JPモルガンやバンク・オブ・アメリカとともにステーブルコイン事業への参入も本格検討中。ウォール街の暗号資産市場への本格進出が加速している。

title: 「Bitcoin Core v30.0」リリース、データ制限の引き上げでコミュニティの意見が対立
contentSnippet: ビットコインソフトのアップデートであるBitcoin Core v30.0が2025年10月12日にリリースされた。OP_RETURNの上限が80バイトから10万バイトへ大幅に引き上げられ、コミュニティで賛否が分かれている。ビットコイン本来の目的との整合性やノード運営リスクが議論されている。

title: 欧州最大手アムンディ、ビットコインETN市場参入を準備
contentSnippet: 欧州最大の資産運用会社アムンディ（運用資産2.3兆ユーロ）が2026年初頭にビットコインETNを発行予定。MiCA施行で規制環境が整備される中、機関投資家の暗号資産投資が本格化。米国ブラックロックのIBIT（971億ドル）に続く動きとして注目される。

title: ハイパーリキッド、HIP-3実装で永久先物市場の自由構築が可能に
contentSnippet: ハイパーリキッドがHIP-3を実装し、開発者が許可なしで独自の永久先物市場を構築することを可能にする。仮想通貨HYPEを一定以上ステーキングすることなどが条件だ。

title: コインチェックでIEO「Fanpla（FPL）」10月21日開始　音楽事務所10社以上が協力
contentSnippet: 音楽ファンクラブ大手Fanplus協業のIEO「Fanpla（FPL）」詳細。10月21日申込開始、11月11日上場予定。700超のファンクラブと400万人基盤という既存インフラを持つ点で過去IEO案件と一線を画す。コインチェック過去実績は抽選倍率24倍・最高23倍に急騰。投資判断に必要な情報を網羅。

title: 三菱UFJモルガン・スタンレー証券、デジタルアセット事業を開始
contentSnippet: 三菱UFJモルガン・スタンレー証券が14日、デジタルアセット事業を開始。債券型セキュリティトークンの取り扱いとデジタル証券取引サービス「ASTOMO」をリリース。不動産STを10万円から投資可能に。

title: イオレ、仮想通貨とAI融合のスーパーアプリ「Neo Crypto Bank」の詳細を発表
contentSnippet: イオレが暗号資産金融事業戦略を発表。2027年にWeb3.0スーパーアプリを公開し、キャッシュレス決済市場1%・年間1.2兆円を目指す。AI統合で次世代金融インフラを構築。

title: Class Action Alleges Microsoft Choked AI Supply to Lift ChatGPT Costs
contentSnippet: Microsoft is being accused of using cloud dominance to restrict AI compute, keeping ChatGPT costs artificially high for nearly three years.

title: ソラナのリキッドステーキングの稼ぎ方｜JitoSOLの仕組みと手順【初心者向け】
contentSnippet: ソラナのリキッドステーキングについて、仕組みから始め方まで徹底解説。JitoやMarinadeなど主要プラットフォームの始め方、年利5-7%の運用方法まで完全ガイド。
